channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon’s ‘Melania’ documentary makes $7M on opening weekend
item.description: While the documentary is exceeding box office expectations, it's unlikely to make a profit in theaters.

item.title: AI layoffs or ‘AI-washing’?
item.description: How many of the companies with recent layoffs are just using AI as an excuse?

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: The great Tesla rebranding
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: Indonesia ‘conditionally’ lifts ban on Grok
item.description: Indonesia has followed Malaysia and the Philippines in lifting a ban on xAI’s chatbot Grok.

item.title: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
item.description: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.

item.title: Best Mirrorless Cameras (2026): Full-Frame, APS-C, and More
item.description: Want the image quality of a DSLR without the bulk? These WIRED picks do more with less.

item.title: The 24 Best Movies on Amazon Prime, WIRED's Picks (February 2025)
item.description: Sinners, Wicked, and Die Hard are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: Cordless Stick Vacuum Throw Down: Bosch, Shark, Dyson (2026)
item.description: Bosch’s Unlimited 10 combines key features from Dyson’s and Shark’s stick vacuums and packs some nice extras, but it can’t seem to keep debris inside.

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein Had a ‘Personal Hacker,’ Informant Claims
item.description: Plus: AI agent OpenClaw gives cybersecurity experts the willies, China executes 11 scam compound bosses, a $40 million crypto theft has an unexpected ...

item.title: 5 Best Touchscreen Gloves (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We braved the cold to answer a modern dilemma: Can you keep your hands warm and use a smartphone at the same time?
